name: 4-Hydroxyphenylacetic acid
desc: 4-Hydroxyphenylacetic acid is a chemical compound found in olive oil and beer. In industry the chemical is an intermediate used to synthesize atenolol and 3,4-dihydroxyphenylacetic acid.
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
